data.title: Broadcasting legend Chris Kamara is the newest Royal Naval Association member
data.meta_description: The Royal Naval Association’s newest member, Football Pundit Chris Kamara, has joined the Royal Naval Association (RNA); the biggest collective group of...
data.text:
The Royal Naval Association’s newest member, Football Pundit Chris Kamara, has joined the Royal Naval Association (RNA); the biggest collective group of Royal Naval veterans, serving personnel and their families, with over18,500 members and over 240 branches in the UK and overseas.

Chris has just published his autobiography ‘Kammy’ and said: “Once a matelot always a matelot; it doesn’t go away. I’ve got a lot to thank Pompey for.”

The RNA offers those with a link to the Royal Navy access to a life-long community of like-minded and supportive individuals. Our community provides companionship, resilience, comradeship and unity to anyone and everyone with a Naval story, supporting them through life's highs and lows.

Bill Oliphant, Chief Executive of the RNA said: “We are very excited to have Chris ‘onboard’ he is a truly inspirational sportsman. Our membership spans all ages, all interests and is based all over the world and are delighted that Chris has come back to his Naval roots!”
